xy$p(x,y)=p(x)\ p(y)$

xy$p(x\mid y)=\dfrac{p(x)\ p(y)}{p(y)}=p(x)$

yx$p(y)^{-1}$$\mu$ $p(x \mid y)=\mu\ p(y\mid x)\ p(x)$

$p(x) = \mathbf {det}(2 \pi \Sigma)^{-\frac{1}{2}} \mathbf{exp} \\{ -\dfrac{1}{2}(x- \mu)^T \Sigma^{-1}(x-\mu)  \\}$
> $\Sigma  \mu$



# 


1. $p(x\_t \mid u\_t, x\_{t-1})$ ,
$x\_t = A\_t x\_{t-1} + B\_tu\_t+ \epsilon _t$ 
2. $p(z_t \mid x_t)$
$z_t = C_tx_t + \delta _t$
3.$bel(x_0)$
$bel(x_0)=p(x_0)$

$bel(x_t)$


{% qnimg ProbabilisticRobotics-03-01.png title: alt: %}
t****$bel(x_t)$$u_t$$\Sigma\_t$t-1****$u\_{t-1}$$\Sigma\_{t-1}$t$\mu_t$$z_t$
****
****$K_t$$Q\_t$$\delta _t$

# 

$x\_t=g(u\_t,x\_{t-1})+\epsilon\_t$
$z_t=h(x_t)+\delta_t$

gh****
$g(u\_t,x\_{t-1})\approx g(u\_t,\mu\_{t-1})+g'(u\_t,\mu\_{t-1})(x\_{t-1}-\mu\_{t-1})\\\ \qquad \quad \ \   = g(u\_t,\mu\_{t-1}) + G\_t(x\_{t-1}-\mu\_{t-1}) $
> $G_t$

$h(x\_t) \approx h(\bar \mu\_t)+h'(u\_t)(x\_t-\bar \mu\_t)
\\\ \quad \ \ \   = h(\bar \mu\_t) + H\_t(x\_t-\bar \mu\_t) $


{% qnimg ProbabilisticRobotics-03-02.png title: alt: %}


********(moments matching)

# 


$\Omega = \Sigma^{-1}$
$\xi = \Sigma^{-1}\mu$


$p(x)=\mathbf{det}(2\pi\Sigma)^{-\frac{1}{2}} \mathbf{exp}\\{ -\frac{1}{2}\mu^T\Sigma^{-1}\mu \\} \mathbf{exp}\\{ -\frac{1}{2}x^T\Sigma^{-1}x+x^T\Sigma^{-1}\mu  \\} $

$\mathbf{det}(2\pi\Sigma)^{-\frac{1}{2}} \mathbf{exp}\\{ -\frac{1}{2}\mu^T\Sigma^{-1}\mu \\}$x$\eta$
$p(x)=\eta \ \mathbf{exp}\\{ -\frac{1}{2}x^T\Omega x + x^T \xi\\}$


{% qnimg ProbabilisticRobotics-03-03.png title: alt: %}


{% qnimg ProbabilisticRobotics-03-04.png title: alt: %}

# 



# 
$m=\\{m\_1, m\_2,... ,m\_N \\}$$N$$n$$m$$n$$m\_{x,y}$

(occupancy grid map)

# (Beam Models)


1.$p\_{hit}$
$p\_{hit}(z\_t^k \mid x\_t, m)=\begin{cases}
\eta \ \mathcal N(z\_t^k;\ z\_t^{k\ast},\ \sigma\_{hit}^2) & if \ 0\leq z\_t^k \leq z\_max \\\
0 & otherwise
\end{cases}$
2.$p\_{short}$
$p\_{short}(z\_t^k \mid x\_t, m)=\begin{cases}
\eta \ \lambda\_{short}e^{-\lambda\_{short} \ \ z\_t^k} & if \ 0\leq z\_t^k \leq z\_t^{k\ast} \\\
0 & otherwise
\end{cases}$
3.$p\_{max}$
$p\_{max}(z\_t^k \mid x\_t, m)= I(z=z\_{max})=\begin{cases}
1 & if \ z=z\_{max} \\\
0 & otherwise
\end{cases}$
4.$p\_{rand}$
$p\_{rand}(z\_t^k \mid x\_t, m)=\begin{cases}
\frac{1}{z\_{max}} & if \ 0\leq z\_t^k < z\_{max} \\\
0 & otherwise
\end{cases}$


{% qnimg ProbabilisticRobotics-06-01.png title: ... alt:... %}

$z\_t$, $x\_t$ $m$$z\_{hit},z\_{short},z\_{max},z\_{rand}$$z\_t$



$Z$$X$$\Theta$$p(Z \mid X, m, \Theta)$
{% qnimg ProbabilisticRobotics-06-02.png title: ... alt:... %}

6.3.3


# (Likelihood Fields)


1.
2.



1.
$p\_{hit}(z\_t^k \mid x\_t, m)=\varepsilon\_{\sigma\_{hit}^2}(dist^2)$

2.
3.


{% qnimg ProbabilisticRobotics-06-03.png title: ... alt:... %}

$(x\_{z\_t^k} \ y\_{z\_t^k})$$(x' \ y')$$z\_{random}$


1.
2.

6.4.2

# 
$m\_{local}$$m$

$\rho\_{m,\ m\_{local} \ \ ,  \ x\_t}=\dfrac{\sum\_{x,y}(m\_{x,y}-\bar m)\cdot(m\_{x,y,local}(x\_t)-\bar m)}{\sqrt{\sum\_{x,y}(m\_{x,y}-\bar m)^2(m\_{x,y,local}(x\_t)-\bar m)^2}}$

$\bar m$
$\bar m = \dfrac{1}{2N} \sum\_{x,y}({m\_{x,y}+m\_{x,y,local}})$





# 


(Landmark)
$f(z\_t)=\\{f\_t^1,f\_t^2,...\\}=\\{(r\_t^1, \phi\_t^1, s\_t^1), (r\_t^2, \phi\_t^2, s\_t^2),... \\}$
$r$$\phi$$s$(signature)

$p(f(z\_t) \mid x\_t,m)=\prod\_i p(r\_t^i, \phi\_t^i, s\_t^i \mid x\_t, m)$

# Pluginlib
pluginlibC++, ROS

pluginlib
**1.**
SLAMSLAMslam_system
```c++
namespace slam {

/**
 * @brief The SLAMBase class
 * all SLAM plugins should inherit this base class, and implement pluginlib-required methods.
 */
    class SLAMBase  {
    public:
    
        virtual void Activate() = 0;

        virtual void Shutdown() = 0;

    };

} // end namespace
```

**2.**
SLAMSLAM

```c++
namespace rgbd_slam{

	class Slam : public slam::SLAMBase {

	public:

        void Activate(){
        // implementment
        }

        void Shutdown(){
        // imimplementment
        }

	};
}

```

packageCMakeLists.txtpackage.xml


**3.**


PLUGINLIB_EXPORT_CLASSpluginlib/class_list_macros.hcpp

```c++
#include<pluginlib/class_list_macros.h>
//
PLUGINLIB_EXPORT_CLASS(rgbd_slam::Slam, slam::SLAMBase);

```

CMakeLists.txt
```
add_library(rgbd_slam
	src/rgbd_slam.cpp
)
```
 catkin_make  devel/lib/ 

**4.ROS**
rgbd_slam.xml

```
<library path="lib/librgbd_slam">
  <class name="rgbd_module" type="rgbd_slam::Slam" base_class_type="slam::SLAMBase">
    <description>This is a rgb_slam plugin.</description>
  </class>
</library>
```

library  lib  librgbd_slam.so library .soclass typenamespace::class base_class namespace::classnamename

package.xmlrgbd_slam.xml
```
  <export>
    <!-- Other tools can request additional information be placed here -->
    <hi_slam plugin="${prefix}/rgbd_module.xml" />
  </export>
```

**5.**
```
rospack plugins --attrib=plugin slam_system

```
slam_system

**6.**

```
//slam_systempackageslam::SLAMBasenamespace::
pluginlib::ClassLoader<slam::SLAMBase> loader("slam_system", "slam::SLAMBase");
boost::shared_ptr<slam::SLAMBase> slam = poly_loader.createInstance("rgbd_slam::Slam");
//or
boost::shared_ptr<slam::SLAMBase> slam = poly_loader.createInstance("rgbd_module");

slam->Activate();
slam->Shutdown();

```

# Dynamic Reconfigure
rgbd_slamlaser_slamDynamic Reconfigure

Dynamic ReconfigureDynamic ReconfigureROS


Dynamic Reconfigure


**1.cfg**

cfgslam.cfg
```
PACKAGE = 'slam_system'

from dynamic_reconfigure.parameter_generator_catkin import *

gen = ParameterGenerator()

gen.add("slam", str_t, 0, "The name of the plugin for the slam.", "rgbd_slam")

exit(gen.generate(PACKAGE, "slam_node", "slam_node"))

```
cfgpythonParameterGeneratoradd()add()

slamstringrgbd_slam
generatorcfgslam_nodeConfig.h

.cfg
CMakeList
```
generate_dynamic_reconfigure_options(
    cfg/slam.cfg
)
add_dependencies(slam_node ${PROJECT_NAME}_gencfg)
```


**2.**

```
#include <dynamic_reconfigure/server.h>
#include <slam_system/slam_nodeConfig.h>

dynamic_reconfigure::Server<slam_system::slam_nodeConfig> server;
dynamic_reconfigure::Server<slam_system::slam_nodeConfig>::CallbackType f;
f = boost::bind(&ConfigCb, _1, _2);
server.setCallback(f);

```
ConfigCb
```
void ConfigCb(slam_node::slam_nodeConfig &config, uint32_t level)
{
//config
}

```

**3.rqt_reconfigure**
```
rosrun rqt_reconfigure rqt_reconfigure
```

e(\xi\_i^m, \xi\_j^s;\xi\_{ij}) = \xi\_{ij} - \begin{pmatrix}

w\_x = \left \lceil \dfrac{W\_x}{r} \right \rceil \quad w\_y = \left \lceil \dfrac{W\_y}{r} \right \rceil \quad w\_{\theta} = \left \lceil \dfrac{W\_{\theta}}{\delta\_{\theta}} \right \rceil 
$$

$\dot{R}(t)R(t)^T=-(\dot{R}(t)R(t)^T)^T$

$\dot{R}(t)R(t)^T$$\phi(t)$$[\phi(t)]\_{\times}=\dot{R}(t)R(t)^T$

$\xi$ ()$[\xi]\_{\times}$

****

&= ... \\\
&= \cos \theta I + (1-\cos\theta)aa^T + \sin \theta [a]\_{\times}
\end{aligned}
\end{equation}
$

$SO(3)$$\mathfrak{so}(3)$

BCH
$
R\_1 R\_2 = \textbf{exp}([\phi\_1]\_{\times})\textbf{exp}([\phi\_2]\_{\times}) \approx \begin{equation}
\begin{cases}
\textbf{exp}( J\_l(\phi\_2)^{-1} \phi\_1 + \phi\_2    )  & \textbf{if  } \phi\_1 \textbf{ is samll}\\\
\textbf{exp}( J\_r(\phi\_1)^{-1} \phi\_2+ \phi\_1    )   & \textbf{if  } \phi\_2 \textbf{ is samll}
\end{cases}
\end{equation}
$



$J\_l$$\mathfrak{se}(3)$$SE(3)$$J$
$J\_l = J=\dfrac{\sin \theta}{\theta} I + (1- \dfrac{\sin \theta}{\theta})aa^T + \dfrac{1-\cos \theta}{\theta}[a]\_{\times}$


$J\_l^{-1} = \dfrac{\theta}{2} \cot \dfrac{\theta}{2} I + (1- \dfrac{\theta}{2}\cot \dfrac{\theta}{2})aa^T - \dfrac{\theta}{2}[a]\_{\times}$


$J\_r(\phi)=J\_l(-\phi)$ 

,

$\textbf{exp}([\phi+ \Delta\phi]\_{\times}) = \textbf{exp}([J\_l \Delta\phi]\_{\times}) \textbf{exp}([\phi]\_{\times})=\textbf{exp}([\phi]\_{\times})\textbf{exp}([J\_r \Delta\phi]\_{\times}) $ 

$\mathfrak{se}(3)$$\mathfrak{so}(3)$


# 1.0

pRR $\phi$$R=\mathbf{exp}([\phi]\_{\times})$$\phi$

$
\begin{equation}
\begin{aligned}
\dfrac{\partial(\textbf{exp}([\phi]\_{\times})p)}{\partial\phi} &= \lim\_{\Delta \phi \rightarrow 0} \dfrac{\textbf{exp}([\phi + \Delta \phi]\_{\times})p-\textbf{exp}([\phi]\_{\times}) p}{\Delta \phi} \\\
&= ... \\\
&= -[Rp]\_{\times}J\_l
\end{aligned}
\end{equation}
$ 

BCH...$j\_l$


# 2.0
$R$$\Delta R$$\Delta \phi$

$
\begin{equation}
\begin{aligned}
\dfrac{\partial(\textbf{exp}([\phi]\_{\times})p)}{\partial(\phi))} &= \lim\_{\Delta \phi \rightarrow 0} \dfrac{\textbf{exp}([\Delta \phi]\_{\times})\textbf{exp}([\phi]\_{\times}) p-\textbf{exp}([\phi]\_{\times}) p}{\Delta \phi} \\\
&= ... \\\
&= -[Rp]\_{\times}
\end{aligned}
\end{equation}
$

\zeta = \begin{bmatrix}
\rho \\\
\phi \\\
\sigma
\end{bmatrix} \in \mathbb{R}^7,[\zeta]\_{\times}=\begin{bmatrix}
\sigma I + [\phi]\_{\times} & \rho \\\
0^T & 0
\end{bmatrix} \in \mathbb{R}^{4\times4}
\end{pmatrix}$

$S = \textbf{exp}([\zeta]\_{\times})=\begin{bmatrix}
e^\sigma \textbf{exp}([\phi]\_{\times})  & J\_s \rho \\\
0^T & 1
\end{bmatrix}
$


$s=e^\sigma, t=J\_s \rho$ 

$Sp$$\zeta$$\mathfrak{sim}(3)$4x7$Sp$q,

$
\dfrac{ \partial Sp }{ \partial(\zeta) } = \begin{bmatrix}
I & [-q]\_{\times} & q\\\
0^T & 0^T & 0
\end{bmatrix}
$

```c++
    //mapodommapodom
    
    r_map_camera = r_map_odom * r_odom_camera
    --> r_map_odom = r_map_camera * r_odom_camera^(-1);
    
    // C_mC_omapodom
    C_m = r_map_odom * C_o + t_map_odom
    C_m = r_map_camera * [0,0,0] + t_map_camera  = t_map_camera
    C_o = r_odom_camera * [0,0,0] + t_odom_camera  = t_odom_camera
    --> t_map_odom = t_map_camera - r_map_odom * t_odom_camera;
    // r_map_odom  t_map_odommapodom
```

$
OA^2 + OB^2 - 2OA \cdot OB \cdot \cos(a,b) = AB^2 \\\
OB^2 + OC^2 - 2OB \cdot OC \cdot \cos(b,c) = BC^2 \\\
OA^2 + OC^2 - 2OA \cdot OC \cdot \cos(a,c) = AC^2 
$

$x=\dfrac{OA}{OC}$$y=\dfrac{OB}{OC}$$A,B,C$$x$$y$
$u=\dfrac{BC^2}{AB^2}$$w=\dfrac{AC}{AB}$$A,B,C$$u,w$


$(1-u)y^2-ux^2-\cos(b,c)y+2uxy \cos(a,b) +1 = 0 \\\
(1-w)x^2-wy^2-\cos(a,c)x+2wxy \cos(a,b) +1 = 0$
